response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a symbol of craftsmanship and excellence. Given its significance, I understand that its true worth may be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $750,000. I believe this is a fair and generous offer considering the quality and rarity of the product. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
